actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to encourage the adoption and use of certified electronic health record technology by safety net providers and clinics under the Medicaid program.
short_title: Medicaid Information Technology to Enhance Community Health Act of 2013

titles.title: Medicaid Information Technology to Enhance Community Health Act of 2013
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to encourage the adoption and use of certified electronic health record technology by safety net providers and clinics under the Medicaid program.
